name: Cybercast
description:
The universe is vast, go explore and uncover its mysteries.

In this 2D exploration game, your job is to travel around the cosmos using your ship's space sonar, collecting various resources from the planets. Then using one of the few upgrade stations around the universe to upgrade your space ship. Be warned, fuel is a scarce and space is vast.

Created for a Game Jam with the theme "transmission"

Controls:

  • E - Interact with planets / fuel station / upgrade station
  • Space - Send up ping
  • Esc - Quit game

Info:

  • Using the upgrade station costs 15 resources and 2 artifacts.
  • Using fuel station costs 5 resources.
